product_name: Boreal Epsilon P300 Kayak with Rudder - Special Buy
long_description: With plenty of leg room for tall paddlers, the 17 ft. 6 in. Boreal Epsilon P300 Kayak with Rudder offers speedy efficiency on long tours, and lots of storage for all your gear. Rotomolded polyethylene construction offers performance, rugged durability and affordability. Large, comfortable cockpit offers excellent freedom of movement especially for tall paddlers. Low sides reduce tendency of kayak to tilt in crosswinds. Foot-pedal-controlled rudder system with cockpit deployment controls help you steer and track effectively. Bow, stern and midship hatches features easy-to-use rubber covers that seal securely. Bungee rigging fore and aft of cockpit. 57 lb. weight. Special buy.
short_description: With plenty of leg room for tall paddlers, the 17 ft. 6 in. Boreal Epsilon P300 Kayak with Rudder offers speedy efficiency on long tours, and lots of storage for all your gear.
